events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I do not wish to keep it.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under refund due to the customer's request for money back on the order.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and will follow up shortly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like to request a refund and I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product has been opened or used, so we can proceed with the refund?
The order number is 123456789, and the product is unopened. I decided I do not want to keep it and kindly request a full refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. You will receive the money back within 5-7 business days once the return is processed.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick help. I appreciate you starting the refund process right away.
The refund has been completed and the amount has been credited back to your original payment method. Please check your account.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that there is nothing else we can assist you with today.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund and no further assistance is needed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
